column4: i want to go back to kaffeine version 0.8.8 on Ubuntu9.10. I have removed kaffeine, how do I install the old version?
if you can get the .deb files from somewhere, you can install them with "dpkg -i"
well, if you want to, you can install from source, just follow the instructions included in the source tarball
fro example, on http://packages.ubuntu.com/jaunty/kaffeine on the bottom of the page "download ..."
but those packages will assume that they are installed on the older release, i.e. that the dependencies are also from that older release. Simply installing them on karmic might break things
